name: NSFilePromiseReceiver
desc: An object that receives a file promise from the pasteboard.

items.name: var fileNames: [String]
items.desc: An array containing names of the promised files being written to the destination location.

items.name: var fileTypes: [String]
items.desc: An array containing types of the promised files being written to the destination location.

items.name: func receivePromisedFiles(atDestination: URL, options: [AnyHashable : Any], operationQueue: OperationQueue, reader: (URL, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Fulfills the promises at the specified destination.

items.name: class var readableDraggedTypes: [String]
items.desc: An array containing dragged file types that are readable.
